live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
62542.summary: Some customers in the Lochdale area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62542.title: June 13 - Burnaby (Lochdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
